body: There is already a complete version of this in Chinese, also this one is missing the incest tag

I spent 1000 yen on DLsite to buy this tank with partiall censorship. Actually there are more of his works on Comic Aun but no one post them on this site.

I don't want to buy all Comic Aun just to read only his, I hope there will be another tank soon
It’s been ages since the Author last work!
